text_block_list.text: It was a calm day in the early summer, shortly after a big race.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: A break, is it?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――I see, this is a plan with my well-being in mind. Then this Yaeno Muteki will pour her body and soul in to taking a break!
It was only for a few days and classes were currently low intensity, so I wanted her to spread her wings a little bit. That was my reasoning behind the break.
The next day after school. I was passing by the training course on my way back――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Huuu. It was a worthwhile training session.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Ah! This is, well, how should I put it……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: I apologize, I understand I'm supposed to be taking a break! But I just can't calm down unless I'm doing some training.
……Yaeno Muteki's straightforwardness was part of her charm and her strength. But I really want her to take a break now!
choice_data_list: Anyways, no training during this break!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Haa……! I apologize for worrying you. I'm ashamed of my own immaturity……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Going forward, I will definitely keep this mistake in mind. I will immediately get changed and return to my dorm……I'm sorry.
And that was how we parted that day…… But could Yaeno Muteki really put her 『Training on Hold』?
And then on the second day of Yaeno Muteki's break.
She's not here――
She's not here either――
And she isn't here either.
After what happened yesterday, I looked around the multiple training spaces around campus……Yaeno Muteki was nowhere to be found.
Maybe she's staying in the dorms or out with her friends. If she was resting, I figured I should head in to town and do some shopping!
On the way home, I decided to take a small detour. This was a place filled with memories. That day――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Suuu――………… Fuuー…………。

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ――Fuu! ……Haaa! ……Seii! ……Taaa!
Right, even back then, she was alone, devoting herself to training. Her graceful movements were proof of that training. That was how I felt――
Right, just like that, Yaeno Muteki was devoting herself to training――

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Ah.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: Wha-……what a coincidence, huh? Were you also taking a walk?
choice_data_list: You were training just now, weren't you?
You were training just now, weren't you?

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……Yes I was……!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: In order to comply with your instructions, I left the school, with all of its training facilities, and that went well in the beginning but……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: As soon as I saw this underpass, I was filled with a sudden sense of nostalgia and motiviation…… There's no excuse. My shamelessness knows no bounds!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: This is a bit difficult to handle on my own…… How should I put it? I panicked, since I felt that if I had free time I should train……
Was it because she couldn't train to her satisfaction or because she struggled with taking breaks? Maybe both?―― She hung her head in dejection.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: B-but Trainer-dono, you felt there was significance in me taking a break……
choice_data_list: I wasn't trying to completely stop you……

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: ……! Ossu! Then I shall continue my current training!
In the end, she continued training until sunset. It seemed like having Yaeno Muteki get some rest would be a difficult task……!
